# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

::: {.cable-meta}
:::


1. COMUSMILGP, Bolivia has received official assurance, Feb 2, from GOB G-4, that transportation costs will be paid by GOB for expedited requirements.
2. Request action soonest. Commence airlift cargo. Stedman
